attacks.name: Attack
attacks.syntax: Our forces will be available again in (\d{1,2}.\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Builders Boon
spells.selfSyntax: Our builders have been blessed with unnatural speed (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Clear Sight
spells.selfSyntax: Our police have been blessed with clear sight (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Fertile Lands
spells.selfSyntax: We have made our lands extraordinarily fertile (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Fog
spells.selfSyntax: Our lands are filled with fog, slowing opposing armies (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Inspire Army
spells.selfSyntax: We expect maintenance costs to be reduced (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Love and Peace
spells.selfSyntax: We expect birth rates to be higher (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Mage's Fury
spells.selfSyntax: The fire of Mage's Fury burns in our wizards' eyes (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Magic Shield
spells.selfSyntax: The magical auras within our province will protect us from the black magic of our enemies (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Meteor Showers
spells.selfSyntax: Meteors rain across our lands, and are not expected to stop (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)
spells.targetSyntax: Meteors will rain across the lands of (?<province>.*\)) for (?<duration>\d{1,2}) day

spells.name: Mind Focus
spells.selfSyntax: Our students are blessed with excellent concentration (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Minor Protection
spells.selfSyntax: Our realm is now under a sphere of minor protection (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Nature Blessing
spells.selfSyntax: Our lands have been blessed by nature (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Patriotism
spells.selfSyntax: Our people are excited about the military and will signup more quickly (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Pitfalls
spells.targetSyntax: Pitfalls will haunt the lands of (?<province>.*\)) for (?<duration>\d{1,2}) days

spells.name: Reflect Magic
spells.selfSyntax: Spells cast upon our lands will have a chance of being reflected back upon the caster (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Storms
spells.selfSyntax: Storms are ravaging our lands! This will last (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)

spells.name: Town Watch
spells.selfSyntax: Our peasants will help defend our lands (for \d{1,2} day|until the end of this day)
